The Tour of Duty 'campaign' is ok, it's fun to play an old CS game with bots which wasn't possible without mods before this game.

The Deleted Scenes campaign however is brilliant, a true Counter-Strike single player campaign. Ritual Entertainment's work here is much better than the bot matches labelled as a 'campaign' in the main game. This should have been in the main game and not hidden away. At least we can be glad it was even released at all and not just joined the pile of unreleased Valve projects. It also received an additional six missions in later updates that are playable from the World Map. If you're a Counter-Strike fan, give both a go but if you only have the time to try one, choose Deleted Scenes.
